definitions.definition: to use physical force to try to defeat another person or group of people:
examples: There wereh children fighting in the playground.

definitions.definition: to use a lot of effort to defeat or achieve something, or to stop something happening:
examples: He fought the disease bravely for three years.
I wish they wouldn't fight in front of the kids.

definitions.definition: an argument or an occasion when someone uses physical force to try to defeat someone:
a situation in which you use a lot of effort to defeat someone or achieve something, or to stop something happening:
examples: We must continue the fight against homelessness.

definitions.definition: the wish or ability to fight or act energetically:
examples: The team came out on the field full of fight.
